Vedang Gupta
is with

and
6 others
.
5h
  ·
BLOCKSOC OFFICE BEARERS 2025-26
Greetings BPHC!
I am thrilled to announce the new office bearers of BlockSoc for the upcoming term 2025–26.
These individuals have consistently demonstrated outstanding dedication, leadership, and a true passion for decentralization and blockchain innovation. I have full confidence that they will carry forward the legacy and steer BlockSoc to even greater milestones.
As I welcome the new office bearers, I also want to express my deepest gratitude to the outgoing office bearers of 2024-25: 
Ravi Koundilya
, 
Srinath Murali
, 
Krish Biswal
. Your commitment, creativity, and impact have been instrumental in defining BlockSoc’s journey this past year, and you leave behind a strong foundation for the new team.
Stay tuned for exciting initiatives and fresh ideas from the new team. Thank you all for your unwavering support and enthusiasm for BlockSoc!
Congratulations to the new team!!!
WAGMI
Signing Off,
Vedang Gupta
President, BlockSoc 2024–25

Nischay Agarwal
1d
  ·
We are filled with immense gratitude and nostalgia as we hand over the office to our talented juniors. 
Our journey in shades as the senate has been so much more than just a position - an year filled with colours, friendships, late night conversations and memories that we will cherish forever. 
We are excited to see how the new PORs take SHADES to even greater heights. We know that you will embrace every challenge with greater passion and unity. 
Here’s to a new colourful term. 
Signing off
Nischay Agarwal
 Bharadwaj Thummalapalli
Palak Agarwal
Kritika Sehgal

Dear all,
We are pleased to announce the commencement of the Placement Drive for the graduating class of 2026 and 2027 at BITS Pilani, Hyderabad Campus.
We would truly appreciate your support in helping us spread the word. A reaction, comment, or repost on the official LinkedIn announcement would greatly contribute to increasing its visibility and ensuring it reaches the appropriate audience, recruiters, alumni, and industry professionals. Your engagement can play a meaningful role in expanding opportunities for our students.
Warm regards,
Placement Unit
BITS Pilani, Hyderabad Campus.

Greetings from SWD Nucleus!
Mess registration for the month of August is scheduled for 29th July 2025 at 10:00 PM.
The Pay and Eat system will be applicable until 31st July, and the mess billing will start from 1st August.
Kindly refer to the attached notice for more details.
Please use personal network. Mess registration will not work on the campus network.
Link for Mess Registration:
swd.bits-hyderabad.ac.in/mess
Note: There will be no mutual mess swaps.
For any queries or issues faced during registration, please email us @ swdnucleus@hyderabad.bits-pilani.ac.in.

MHSG Induction Results
Hello everyone!
We are thrilled to announce the results of our induction procedure. It was a tough decision given the incredible pool of applicants but after thoughtful consideration, we are excited to welcome a new set of passionate individuals into our family.
Congratulations to all those inducted! We can't wait to see the energy and ideas you have to offer.
For those who did not make it this time, we genuinely appreciate your efforts and wish the best for you. Hoping to see you all in the next inductions!
If you have any queries, feel free to reach out to any of us. We are more than happy to help.

2d
  ·
Brindavanam Office Bearers 2025-26
As we bid farewell to our posts after a year filled with incredible events—movie screenings with tumultuous uproar, stunning Audi performances, Sri Rama Navami celebrations reminiscent of an actual wedding, a cultural night full of colourful performances and an electrifying DJ, a Tollywood quiz with mind-boggling questions , 2-day long Sankranti festivities, fun-filled interactions with movie stars and Intro meets that lasted well into the night—we are overwhelmed with gratitude for your unwavering support and enthusiasm. Each event was a testament to our shared passion for our Telugu culture and community.
Brindavanam Telugu Samithi has made a lasting impact on us . This family brought us closer together and enriched our lives in countless ways; and taught us so much about leadership and commitment.
As we look forward, we are excited to announce the new panel that will continue this journey:
President: Rithwik Sai Reddy
Secretaries: Sai Jaswanth, Sameeksha Y
Treasurer: Aishwarya V
Tech & Media Lead: Rishith Reddy
We have had the privilege of working closely with these extraordinary individuals, and we can vouch for their passion and commitment to our association's values. 
We invite you to join us in welcoming them with the same warmth and encouragement you have shown us. Together, let's continue to celebrate our traditions and create more cherished moments.
With heartfelt gratitude and anticipation for the future,
Signing off,
Panel of 2024-25,
Brindavanam Telugu Samithi
#AsaluMajaTeluguRa
#ManaTeluguManaBrindavanam

Graduating Class Campaign 2025 – Travel Grant Initiative | Mandatory Consent Form by 29th July
Important for 2021 Batch Single degree and 2020 Batch Dual Degree: Fill the Mandatory Consent Form (Deadline: 29th July)
https://forms.gle/SijS41YBjBgFzAhYA
Dear Graduating Batch of 2025,
Greetings from the Student Alumni Relations Cell!
We’re proud to share that the Travel Grant has been selected as the cause for the Graduating Class Campaign 2025, an initiative that reflects the spirit of support, access, and giving back.
Far too often, students miss out on exceptional opportunities like conferences, competitions, and academic presentations; not because of a lack of merit, but due to financial limitations. This campaign is our collective step towards ensuring that no deserving student is ever held back for want of resources.
The fund will be created through a voluntary deduction from your ₹3000 caution deposit. No additional contribution is required, your consent is all it takes to make a lasting impact.
This initiative is applicable to all members of the Graduating Batch of 2025, that includes 2021 batch single degree and 2020 batch dual degree students.
Let’s leave behind something meaningful, a legacy that opens doors.
DOCS.GOOGLE.COM
docs.google.com

Greetings from the Journal Club!
With a new academic year just around the corner, the thought of the academic journey ahead is likely on many of our minds. It’s a subject the university has been reflecting on as well in recent years.
In this interview, Prof. Santosh Mahapatra offers insight into ongoing discussions surrounding the first-year curriculum and how proposed changes seek to better align with the institution’s goals for its students.

*Exciting Opportunity*
*Request for contacts/leads to share this across all campuses*
Immediate opportunities in Kearney, a leading management consulting company, in their Digital & Analytics Practice.
Looking for high performing candidates from reputed institutes (IITs, IIITs, BITS, leading NITs) across 2 categories -
Category 1 - 3+ years of experience in any of the following sectors: SDLC, Cloud, DevOps, Arcitecture, AI/ML, etc.
Category 2 - Candidates with 2+ years of experience in consulting/ startups
Interested candidates may send their resume to Anand.mantri@kearney.com and shiv.raj@kearney.com with subject line item - Category 1/2_College Name
TIA!

"Opportunity to waive your GRE fee. Join us before 28th July"
Dear BITSians,
Planning for GRE or dreaming of studying abroad? Here's a crazy opportunity you shouldn't miss.
Ambitio's GRE Bootcamp is not just another prep class – it’s a full-blown launchpad designed by BITSian, for BITSians. Whether you're just starting out or halfway there, this bootcamp will supercharge your prep. Here's how:
Peer Community: Prep with a group of students aiming for GRE just like you.
Expert Sessions: Learn proven tips from those who’ve already aced the GRE.
Quiz of the Day: 200+ GRE-style questions every day to sharpen your skills.
Ambitio GRE Platform: Planners, video lessons, sectional & full-length mock tests.
Mentor Insights: Learn what to do (and what not to) from past bootcamp toppers.
Score High, GRE Fee On Us: Top scorers might get their GRE fee sponsored by Ambitio!
And this is all for free. Register with us and continue your journey of acing GRE and study abroad.
Link: https://ambitio.club/study-abroad/gre-bootcamp-bits/

6d
  ·
Introducing Surge
CRUx presents Surge, a centralized cc website for BPHC students to track and grow their competitive programming performance.
Try it out here: https://surge.crux-bphc.com/
Here are some of the features of Surge:
- A campus-wide leaderboard to see how you rank among peers across all batches.
- A curated list of resources, starting with CRUx’s Bootstrap modules.
- Contest-specific campus leaderboards for every rated Codeforces contest.
- A handpicked Problem of the Day to keep your practice consistent and targeted.
- Detailed Codeforces statistics for your profile
If you notice any bugs or want to suggest new features let us know here: https://github.com/crux-bphc/surge/issues
We’d like to thank
Archisman Das
,
Manjot Singh
,
Shiv Patil
,
Rahul Saraf
,
Yash Kejriwal
, and
Saanvi Varma
for their work in bringing Surge to life!

Surge is fully open source, feel free to contribute: https://github.com/crux-bphc/surge

PS. If you face issues while verifying your Codeforces handle, it might be due to temporary downtime on Codeforces. Please try again after a short while and if that happens again send us a mail at crux@hyderabad.bits-pilani.ac.in.

Why Should You Participate?
 • ₹1 Lakh in Prizes – Big rewards for bold, innovative ideas
 • Expert Mentorship – Learn directly from Astera’s world-class engineers
 • Internship Opportunity – You may win a chance to intern at Astera Labs, a global leader powering the future of AI and Cloud
